channel.title: Pulsar Collective / Improvised Live Electro
channel.description:
This is a project by me and @logsol. We started playing in the park and on the street with our axoloti/battery powerd setups and started to play gigs in clubs and on festivals in the last years.
Now we started recording jams (with multiple iphones) and wanna do this more regulary (with guests also). This is the first one:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oWE6qPkXvxA
I play the instruments, delay, reverb looper and filter/stutter sequencer are axoloti based :nerd_face:

item.title: Pulsar Collective / Improvised Live Electro
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Hey there, thanks!

The setup is only hardware. We use a laptop or iphone hooked up to the kmix for recordings though.

My is pedals, voice live --> axoloti for looping and fx.
logsol makes the beats on the model samples and uses axoloti as a midi translator for the midi mix and dj effects unit. Furthermore we built a bass synth together that is controlled with the akai keyboard and runs on the hohum board.

Read full topic
